item.title: Online Marketing for Antivirus Software
item.description:
Antivirus software is a computer software which is installed to prevent, detect and remove malicious softwares like viruses, malware, worms, spyware, trojans etc

Main Antivirus softwares are + Bitdefender + Kaspersky + Norton + AVG + BullGuard

While trying to market Antivirus Softwares, Adwords is one of the best options.

We have created an adwords campaign which includes all the top keywords searched by users in United States
item.dc:creator: Salil Panikkaveettil

item.title: Hello World from AdMasterMind
item.description: We are launching AdMasterMind with an aim to make online marketing efficient for advertisers. Stay tuned for awesome product announcements and services
